title: Internal Notice: Change in Remote Work Policy
text:
To: All Employees
From: Human Resources Department
Subject: Update on Remote Work Policy

Dear Team,

As part of our continued effort to support flexibility and productivity, we are updating our remote work policy effective from next month. Employees will now be allowed to work remotely up to three days per week, instead of the previous two.

However, please note that each department manager must approve individual remote work schedules to ensure adequate in-office coverage. Employees who wish to work remotely on Mondays or Fridays must submit a request form through the HR portal by the end of this week.

Additionally, starting next quarter, all remote employees will be required to attend a quarterly virtual check-in meeting with their supervisors to discuss performance and goals.

For detailed policy guidelines, please refer to the attached document or contact your HR representative.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Human Resources Department

questions.question_text: What is the main purpose of this notice?
choices_text: To announce a change in remote work rules
To introduce new employees to the HR team
To cancel all remote work options
To remind staff of an upcoming company event
questions.explanation: この通知は、リモートワークの規則変更を従業員に知らせることが目的です。
wrong_explanations: この通知は新入社員の紹介ではありません。
リモートワークを完全に廃止するものではありません。
社内イベントのリマインドではありません。
